title: -kodik/-kedik/-ködik verbs
sentences: The little girl was proudly bragging about her new dress.
The mother lovingly cares for her children.
The thief was hiding from the police in the dark shadow.
Don't be cheeky with your elders!
The athlete was rightfully proud of the gold medal.
They argued/debated a lot about the current state of politics.
The children played tag for hours in the garden.
arról, hogy világ körüli útra megy.
He often dreams/daydreams about going on a world tour.
The criminal was fleeing/absconding from the law for a long time.
He likes to do gardening in his free time.
The grandmother was sickly/ailing a lot last winter.
The neighbor is always peeping/spying from the window.
Don't pick a fight with me, I'm not in the mood!
The young people were joking around/having fun on the street.
He thinks a lot about his future.
The soldiers hid away in the forest.
He would like to assist in the kitchen.
The children were playing hide and seek in the yard.
Body language reveals/betrays a lot about emotions.
He likes to do DIY/tinker in the garage.
He was very anxious and was worrying/fretting before the exam.
He is always being punctual/precise, he is never late.
He is being nitpicky/obstructionist a lot at meetings.
The actor entertained the viewers by masquerading on stage.
He likes to spend time solving puzzles on the weekend.
Don't act so important, you're not the boss!
Grandpa likes to talk politics and be a know-it-all.
He idles/loafs around a lot on Sunday afternoons.
He always sees to it/cares that there is enough food.
The little girl is standing on tiptoe to see out the window.
Don't misbehave, otherwise you won't get a present!
He likes to go adventuring and camping in nature.
The student is being diligent with his studies.
We do a lot of light cooking/pottering in the kitchen with our friends.
Don't act indecently here, behave yourself!
The children were playing soldiers with toy weapons.
He is always being clever/crafty to solve problems.
He has a lot of fun and is being jokey in the company.
Don't be incredulous, this is the pure truth!
dictionary:
dicsekszik - to brag / boast
gondoskodik - to care for / provide for
rejtőzködik - to hide oneself
pimaszkodik - to be cheeky / impudent
büszkélkedik - to be proud of / boast
vitatkozik - to argue / debate
fogócskázik - to play tag
álmodozik - to dream / daydream
szökdösik - to flee / abscond repeatedly
kertészkedik - to do gardening
betegeskedik - to be sickly / ailing
leskelődik - to peep / spy
kötekedik - to pick a fight / be provocative
mókázik - to joke around / have fun
gondolkodik - to think / contemplate
segédkezik - to assist / help out
bújócskázik - to play hide and seek
árulkodik - to reveal / tell on / betray
gúnyolódik - to mock / jeer
barkácsol - to do DIY / tinker
aggodalmaskodik - to worry / fret
pontoskodik - to be punctual / precise
akadékoskodik - to be nitpicky / obstructionist
maskarázik - to masquerade
rejtvényfejtősködik - to spend time solving puzzles
fontoskodik - to act important / be officious
okoskodik - to be a know-it-all / rationalize
lustálkodik - to idle / loaf around
pipiskedik - to stand on tiptoe
rosszalkodik - to misbehave
sátorozik - to camp (in a tent)
szorgalmaskodik - to be diligent / work hard
főzőcskézik - to cook (informal/lightly)
fajtalankodik - to act indecently / lewdly
katonáskodik - to play soldiers / serve as soldier
ügyeskedik - to be clever / crafty / manipulate
vicceskedik - to be jokey / facetious
hitetlenkedik - to be incredulous / disbelieve
